Since around 2011, I have dedicated most of my free time to helping further my favorite open-source projects. You probably know me from Anonymous Planet. I frequent the Privacy, Security and Anonymity space. If you would like to get in touch, feel free. I will update this fairly often. Below you can find my various accounts.
